name: 科學哲學
comment: 修課同學須具備科學教育或數學教育基礎
description: 本課程同時包含知識論與本體論的探討。知識論的部分主要探討科學哲學的發展與討論，本體論的部分主要探討生物哲學中過程觀點的內容與應用。
goals: 探討科學知識發展歷程
探討科學知識與其哲學理念
syllabus:
01 導論 科學哲學的新 觀點 物質科學與生命科學(introduction: a new perspective of the philosophy of science)  
02 希臘時期到 奧古斯都孔德 思考三部曲(the trilogy of the development of scientific thinking, from the ancient Greek to A. Comte)  
03 維也納學圈 與邏輯實證主義及經驗主義(Vienna Circle: Logical positivism and empiricism)  
04 劃界主義的立場(Demarcationism)  
05 否證論 與批判理性主義(falsificationism and critical rationalism)  
06 科學哲學的革命 孔恩 拉卡托斯 和勞丹(Revolution of philosophy of science, Kuhn, Lakaton and Laudan)  
07 科學進步的理論(Theories of scientific progresses)  
08 反對方法與科學的政府主義(against method and science anarchism)  
09 科學人類學 與科學文化研究.(cultural studies of science)

10\. Dupre, J. & Nicholson, D.J.: A Manifesto for a processual Philosophy

11\. Nicholson, D.J.: Reconceptualizing the organism: from complex machine to flowing stream

12\. Arnellos, A.: From organizations of processes to organisms and other biological individuals

13\. Griffiths, P. & Stotz, K.: Developmental systems theory as a process theory

14\. Fabris, F.: Waddington’s processual epigenetics and the debate over cryptic variability

15\. Guttinger, S.: A process ontology for macromolecular biology

16\. Bertolaso, M. & Dupre, J.: A processual perspective on cancer

17\. Simons, P.: Processes and Precipitates

18\. Seibt, J.: Ontological tools for the Process turn in biology: some basic notions of general process theory
